_doc: Accumulated analytical insights across sessions. Skills read at startup and append new findings at completion. Replaces hardcoded known-result tables in skill prompts.

findings.evidence: +10.4% DPS without fragment overflow guard on Fracture in ST

findings.insight: Sigil of Spite fragment guard too restrictive at <=3
Spirit Bomb pooling (guarding Soul Cleave to save fragments) hurts DPS
findings.evidence: -1.3% to -2.8% DPS when restricting Soul Cleave to preserve fragments for Spirit Bomb

findings.insight: Meta-priority Fracture (extra fragment generation during Metamorphosis) gains DPS
findings.evidence: +5.2% DPS when prioritizing Fracture during Meta for the extra fragment

findings.insight: Fiery Brand-first cooldown ordering gains DPS
findings.evidence: +0.6% DPS when Fiery Brand fires before other cooldowns to establish the damage amp window

findings.insight: Spirit Bomb threshold 5 optimal, supersedes 3/4/5 noise claim
findings.evidence: +0.21% weighted at confirm fidelity (ST +0.36%, 10T +0.44%, 5T -0.20%). Threshold 3 is -0.51% (5T: -1.50%), threshold 6 is -0.95%. Sweet spot confirmed at 5.

findings.insight: call_action_list has zero overhead vs inline actions
findings.evidence: Flat AR list (all actions inline) vs sub-list structure: -0.01% weighted at confirm fidelity. No performance difference.

findings.insight: FelDev before Brand is a loss — Brand-first CD ordering critical
findings.evidence: FelDev above cooldowns: -0.58% weighted, -1.18% ST. 2s channel delays FD window opening.

findings.insight: Holding CDs for Fiery Demise window costs more than it gains
findings.evidence: Adding Brand-alignment conditions (hold <=15s) to Spite/FelDev: -0.32% weighted. Delayed casts outweigh the +30% FD bonus.

findings.insight: Brand-Meta alignment (holding Brand for Meta) is a loss
findings.evidence: Brand hold <=5s for Meta: -0.45% weighted, -0.96% ST. FD window value exceeds Meta overlap bonus.

findings.insight: SC consuming fragments before SBomb threshold catastrophic in AoE
findings.evidence: SC Fury dump at fury>=100 before Fracture: -2.70% at 10T. Fragment consumption prevents SBomb pooling.

findings.insight: 5 talent swaps yield +8-10% DPS across all scenarios
findings.evidence: Adding Down in Flames, Soul Carver, Darkglare Boon, Soulcrush, Ascending Flame while dropping Last Resort, Calcified Spikes, Feed the Demon, Stoke the Flames, and reducing Charred Flesh to rank 1: ST +8.0% (29218→31555), 5T +10.3% (91978→101451), 10T +10.0% (163116→179395).

findings.insight: 2-charge Fiery Brand condition gains only +0.07% weighted
findings.evidence: With Down in Flames (2 charges, 48s CD), using charges>=2|!dot.ticking instead of !dot.ticking: +0.22% at 10T, negligible ST/5T. The old 1-charge condition already works well because 48s CD means Brand is usually available when dot expires.

findings.insight: Soul Carver FD gate is free with 2-charge Brand
findings.evidence: Removing FD gate from Soul Carver: +0.02% weighted at confirm fidelity. With 2 Brand charges providing ~40-50% FD uptime, the gate barely delays Soul Carver casts.

findings.insight: Soulcrush does not change optimal Spirit Bomb threshold
findings.evidence: SBomb threshold 4 vs 5 with Soulcrush (doubled Frailty): -0.01% weighted, within noise. Threshold 5 remains optimal.

findings.insight: Spec tree has zero slack for DPS-neutral drops beyond 2 points in S3
findings.evidence: Gate constraint (S1+S2 >= 20 points) forces at least 3 drops from Section 3, where only Last Resort has zero DPS value. Stoke the Flames and Charred Flesh rank were the lowest-impact available S3 drops.
